name: TRIO Upward Bound
description: Free college preparation including tutoring, campus visits, SAT prep, and application help for first-generation and low-income students
fullDescription: TRIO Upward Bound helps high school students from low-income families and first-generation college students prepare for and succeed in higher education.
whatTheyOffer:
- Academic tutoring and instruction
- College campus visits and exploration
- SAT/ACT preparation
- Financial aid and scholarship guidance
- Summer programs on college campuses
- Mentoring and personal counseling
- Help with college applications
howToGetIt:
1. Must be in high school (typically 9th-12th grade)
2. Must be low-income or potential first-generation college student
3. Programs located at colleges throughout Bay Area
4. Contact local Upward Bound program to apply
5. Application typically includes interview and assessment
keywords: TRIO, Upward Bound, college prep, first-generation, low-income, high school, college access, tutoring, mentoring, SAT prep
